home.title: Ring Platform - Decentralized Opportunities & Professional Networking
home.description: Connect, collaborate, and create value in the decentralized economy. Join Ring Platform for professional networking, opportunities, and blockchain-enabled collaboration.
home.ogDescription: Discover and create opportunities in the decentralized economy

store.title: Ring Store - Innovative Products & Services
store.description: Discover and purchase innovative products and services on Ring platform. Secure checkout with multiple payment options including RING tokens.

list.title: Ring Store - Browse {{count}} Products
list.description: Browse {{count}} innovative products and services. Find everything you need on Ring platform's decentralized marketplace.

checkout.title: Secure Checkout - Ring Store
checkout.description: Complete your purchase securely on Ring platform. Multiple payment options available including RING tokens and traditional methods.

status.title: Checkout {{status}} - Ring Store
status.description: Your checkout is {{status}}. View your order status and next steps.

cart.title: Shopping Cart - Ring Store
cart.description: Review your selected items and proceed to secure checkout. Manage your cart on Ring platform.

orders.title: My Orders - Ring Store
orders.description: View and manage your order history on Ring platform. Track shipments and manage returns.

list.title: Order History - {{count}} Orders
list.description: View your complete order history with {{count}} orders. Track shipments and manage returns.

detail.title: Order #{{orderId}} - Ring Store
detail.description: View details for order #{{orderId}}. Track shipment status and manage your order.

auth.title: Authentication - Ring Platform
auth.description: Secure authentication and account management for Ring platform users. Multiple sign-in options available.

login.title: Sign In - Ring Platform
login.description: Sign in to your Ring Platform account. Access your professional network, opportunities, and blockchain features.

status.title: {{action}} {{status}} - Ring Platform
status.description: Your {{action}} is {{status}}. Manage your authentication status and next steps.

entities.title: Professional Entities - Ring Platform
entities.description: Discover and connect with professional entities, organizations, and businesses on Ring platform. Comprehensive directory with verification system.

list.title: Professional Entities Directory - {{count}} Organizations
list.description: Browse {{count}} verified professional entities and organizations. Connect with businesses and expand your professional network.

add.title: Add Your Entity - Ring Platform
add.description: Register your organization or business entity on Ring platform. Get verified and connect with the professional community.

status.title: Entity {{action}} {{status}} - Ring Platform
status.description: Your entity {{action}} is {{status}}. Manage your entity status and next steps on Ring platform.

opportunities.title: Business Opportunities - Ring Platform
opportunities.description: Discover and create business opportunities, partnerships, and collaborations on Ring platform. Connect with professionals and grow your network.

list.title: Business Opportunities - {{count}} Active Listings
list.description: Browse {{count}} active business opportunities and partnerships. Find your next collaboration on Ring platform.

add.title: Post Opportunity - Ring Platform
add.description: Create and post a new business opportunity or partnership request. Connect with the right professionals on Ring platform.

status.title: Opportunity {{action}} {{status}} - Ring Platform
status.description: Your opportunity {{action}} is {{status}}. Manage your opportunity status and next steps.

news.title: Ring Platform News & Updates
news.description: Stay updated with the latest news, announcements, and developments from Ring Platform and the decentralized ecosystem.

list.title: Latest News - {{count}} Articles
list.description: Read the latest {{count}} news articles and updates from Ring Platform and the blockchain ecosystem.

profile.title: My Profile - Ring Platform
profile.description: Manage your Ring Platform profile, preferences, and account settings. Update your professional information and privacy settings.

user.title: {{username}}'s Profile - Ring Platform
user.description: View {{username}}'s professional profile on Ring Platform. Connect and collaborate with verified professionals.

settings.title: Account Settings - Ring Platform
settings.description: Manage your Ring Platform account settings, preferences, and security options. Control your privacy and notification preferences.

notifications.title: Notification Settings - Ring Platform
notifications.description: Manage your notification preferences for Ring Platform. Control how you receive updates and alerts.

notifications.title: Notifications - Ring Platform
notifications.description: View and manage your Ring Platform notifications. Stay updated with important alerts and messages.

status.title: Notification {{action}} {{status}} - Ring Platform
status.description: Your notification {{action}} is {{status}}. Manage your notification settings and preferences.

about.title: About Ring Platform - Decentralized Professional Network
about.description: Learn about Ring Platform's mission to create a decentralized professional networking and opportunities ecosystem. Discover our vision for the future of work.

contact.title: Contact Ring Platform - Get in Touch
contact.description: Get in touch with the Ring Platform team. Contact us for support, partnerships, or general inquiries about our decentralized platform.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Ring Platform
privacy.description: Read Ring Platform's comprehensive privacy policy. Learn how we protect your data and respect your privacy in the decentralized ecosystem.

terms.title: Terms of Service - Ring Platform
terms.description: Read Ring Platform's terms of service and user agreement. Understand your rights and responsibilities on our decentralized platform.

membership.title: Ring Membership - Premium Features & Benefits
membership.description: Discover Ring Platform membership benefits and premium features. Upgrade to access exclusive opportunities and enhanced networking tools.

wallet.title: Ring Wallet - Manage Your RING Tokens
wallet.description: Manage your RING tokens, track your balance, and handle transactions securely on Ring Platform's integrated wallet.

nft.title: NFT Marketplace - Ring Platform
nft.description: Explore, buy, and sell NFTs on Ring Platform's decentralized marketplace. Discover unique digital assets and collections.

collections.title: NFT Collections - Ring Platform
collections.description: Browse NFT collections on Ring Platform. Discover unique digital art and assets from verified creators.

search.title: Search NFTs - Ring Platform
search.description: Search for specific NFTs, collections, and digital assets on Ring Platform's decentralized marketplace.

admin.title: Admin Dashboard - Ring Platform
admin.description: Administrative dashboard for Ring Platform management. Monitor users, content, and platform analytics.

analytics.title: Platform Analytics - Ring Admin
analytics.description: View comprehensive analytics and insights about Ring Platform usage, engagement, and performance.

users.title: User Management - Ring Admin
users.description: Manage Ring Platform users, roles, and permissions. Monitor user activity and handle moderation.

moderation.title: Content Moderation - Ring Admin
moderation.description: Moderate Ring Platform content, handle reports, and maintain community standards.

security.title: Security Dashboard - Ring Admin
security.description: Monitor Ring Platform security, review logs, and manage security settings and protocols.
